page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: The farms in the area are{Cormaddie including Williamsfield, Charlesfield and others:{Muirside}including Newtonrigg, East & West Crossleys:{ {Rosehill}including Kilncroft & Killylung:{Abbey}including Holm and McWhanrick:{Nether Gribton}including Gribton:{Upper Cluden}including Kilness, Slaethorn & Burnfoot of Cluden:{Birkhall}includes Mosside:{ {West Cluden}includes old crofts of same name{ Bearcroft}just touches the area. Rosehill, Abbey, Muirside and Birkhall are all owned by{Cowhill Estate.}The others are owner occupied. The main farms including tenanted farms have been occupied by the same families for over 50 years (some 3rd generation) except Nether Gribton which changed hands about 40 yrs ago.
